name: Mazeglaser (itch)
description:
Mazeglaser is a simple but challenging plaformer, where you can a die a lot. Touch  some lava, ghosts, or basicly anything that's not a wall or rope, and you are back at the entrance of the room. You can save though. You'll navigate through mazes, if a wall looks funny, or hear a faint noise, you can find secret rooms with huge treasures - you can collect coins. There is a whole secret level to explore. You'll probably say stuff like: 'This room is falling apart!', 'Why lava is following me?' or 'MY SHADOW JUST ATE ME!!!'.

Finally, if you are interested in the super-fine art of crafting levels, there is a level editor for you.
